dependencies.description:
Pillow-SIMD is a SIMD-enabled fork of Pillow. It is usually 4-6x faster
than the original Pillow in image processing benchmarks.
dependencies.name: pil

dependencies.description:
aiofiles is an Apache2 licensed library, written in Python, for handling
local disk files in asyncio applications.
dependencies.name: py-aiofiles

dependencies.description:
Supports both client and server side of HTTP protocol. Supports both
client and server Web-Sockets out-of-the-box and avoids Callbacks.
Provides Web-server with middlewares and plugable routing.
dependencies.name: py-aiohttp

and async APIs, and support for both HTTP/1.1 and HTTP/2.

inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.

dependencies.description:
Markdown parser, done right. 100% CommonMark support, extensions, syntax

dependencies.description:
MarkupSafe is a library for Python that implements a unicode string that
is aware of HTML escaping rules and can be used to implement automatic
string escaping. It is used by Jinja 2, the Mako templating engine, the
Pylons web framework and many more.
dependencies.name: py-markupsafe
